sources.unified: Merged from JSON extraction and TypeScript parameters

parameters.name: Biofilm Adhesion Strength
parameters.description: Force required to detach biofilm from electrode

parameters.name: Cell Doubling Time
parameters.description: Time required for cell population to double

parameters.name: Substrate Utilization Rate
parameters.description: Rate of substrate consumption by microbes

parameters.name: Microbial Diversity Index
parameters.description: Shannon diversity index of microbial community

parameters.name: Microbial Species
parameters.description: Primary microbial species in the fuel cell

parameters.name: C/N Ratio
parameters.description: Carbon to nitrogen ratio in substrate

parameters.name: COD Concentration
parameters.description: Chemical oxygen demand of the substrate

parameters.name: Substrate Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of organic substrate in the feed

parameters.name: Substrate Loading Rate
parameters.description: Rate of substrate addition to reactor

parameters.name: Chemical Stability
parameters.description: Stability of electrolyte composition over time

parameters.name: Buffer Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of pH buffer in solution

parameters.name: Buffer Type
parameters.description: Type of pH buffer system used

parameters.name: Dissolved Oxygen
parameters.description: Concentration of dissolved oxygen in electrolyte

parameters.name: Calcium Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of Ca²⁺ ions in solution

parameters.name: Chloride Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of Cl- ions in solution

parameters.name: Magnesium Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of Mg²⁺ ions in solution

parameters.name: Phosphate Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of PO4³⁻ ions in solution

parameters.name: Potassium Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of K+ ions in solution

parameters.name: Sodium Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of Na+ ions in solution

parameters.name: Sulfate Ion Concentration
parameters.description: Concentration of SO4²⁻ ions in solution

parameters.name: Limiting Current
parameters.description: Maximum current limited by mass transport

parameters.name: Overpotential
parameters.description: Voltage loss due to kinetic limitations

parameters.name: Redox Potential
parameters.description: Standard reduction potential of electrode reactions

parameters.name: Tafel Slope
parameters.description: Slope of Tafel plot for electrode kinetics

parameters.name: Charge Transfer Resistance
parameters.description: Resistance to electron transfer at electrode interface

parameters.name: Internal Resistance
parameters.description: Internal resistance of the fuel cell

parameters.name: Ohmic Resistance
parameters.description: Resistance due to electrolyte and electrode materials

parameters.name: Cell Voltage
parameters.description: Operating voltage of the fuel cell

parameters.name: Energy Density
parameters.description: Energy storage capacity per unit volume

parameters.name: Maximum Power Density
parameters.description: Peak power density achievable by the system

parameters.name: Peak Current
parameters.description: Maximum current output of the system

parameters.name: Power Density
parameters.description: Power output per unit volume or area

parameters.name: Voltage Stability
parameters.description: Standard deviation of voltage over time

parameters.name: Air Flow Rate
parameters.description: Ventilation air flow rate around system

parameters.name: Thermal Conductivity
parameters.description: Heat transfer coefficient of reactor materials

parameters.name: Photoperiod
parameters.description: Duration of light exposure per day

parameters.name: Electrode Surface Area
parameters.description: Total surface area of the electrode

parameters.name: Specific Surface Area
parameters.description: Surface area per unit mass of electrode

parameters.name: Anode Material
parameters.description: Material composition of the anode electrode

parameters.name: Catalyst Loading
parameters.description: Amount of catalyst per unit electrode area

parameters.name: Cathode Material
parameters.description: Material composition of the cathode electrode

parameters.name: Average Pore Size
parameters.description: Mean pore diameter in electrode material

parameters.name: Electrode Surface Roughness
parameters.description: Surface roughness factor of electrode material

parameters.name: Data Backup Frequency
parameters.description: How often data is backed up

parameters.name: Data Storage Capacity
parameters.description: Amount of data that can be stored

parameters.name: External Load
parameters.description: External resistance connected to the circuit

parameters.name: Flow Velocity
parameters.description: Linear velocity of fluid through reactor

parameters.name: Recirculation Ratio
parameters.description: Ratio of recirculated to fresh feed

parameters.name: Chamber Configuration
parameters.description: Number and arrangement of reactor chambers

parameters.name: Reactor Volume
parameters.description: Total internal volume of the reactor

parameters.name: Surface Area to Volume Ratio
parameters.description: Ratio of reactor surface area to volume
